ygData.subject: New Cantera input file format + documentation
ygData.msgSnippet: Cantera has a new input file format, designed for specifying both single-phase and multi-phase problems. At least, it WILL have the new format as soon as

Cantera has a new input file format, designed for specifying both 
single-phase and multi-phase problems. At least, it WILL have the new 
format as soon as version 1.5 is released, which is a few days away for 
unix, a few more for Windows.

BUT while you are waiting you can read all about it in a new document I 
have written called "Defining Phases and Interfaces". This not only 
describes the new format, but introduces some new parts of Cantera 
briefly (surface chemistry, electrochemistry), and has a couple of 
complete examples. The document is available now on the SourceForge 
site http://sourceforge.net/projects/cantera in "Files/Cantera 
Documentation/Input Files".

I hope you will take a look at it, and if you have comments or 
suggestions, please let me know.

Dave
